name: Alice Smith
summary_of_diagnosis: Urinary tract infection (UTI), Hypertension, Mild fever and sore throat, Seasonal allergy with mild rash, Iron deficiency anemia, Acute sinusitis, Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), Migraine headaches, Vitamin D deficiency, Acute bronchitis
medication: Ferrous sulfate 325mg, Lisinopril 10mg, Amoxicillin 500mg, Augmentin 875mg, Vitamin D3 2000 IU, Omeprazole 20mg, Nitrofurantoin 100mg
tests: Upper endoscopy (if symptoms persist), Sinus CT scan (if no improvement), 25-Hydroxy vitamin D blood test, Urine culture, Chest X-ray, Blood pressure monitoring, Complete blood count (CBC)

name: Bob Johnson
summary_of_diagnosis: Type 2 diabetes, Seasonal allergies, Chronic back pain, High cholesterol, Anxiety
tests: HbA1c, Psychiatric evaluation, Lipid profile, MRI scan

name: Charlie Brown
summary_of_diagnosis: GERD, Seasonal allergies, Mild acne, Insomnia, Asthma
medication: Salbutamol Inhaler, Clindamycin 1% gel, Pantoprazole 40mg, Zolpidem 10mg
tests: Allergy skin test, Endoscopy, Spirometry, Sleep study

name: Daisy Ridley
summary_of_diagnosis: Allergic rhinitis, Hypertension, Hypothyroidism, Osteoarthritis, Chronic fatigue syndrome
medication: Vitamin B12 supplements, Glucosamine sulfate, Fluticasone nasal spray, Levothyroxine 100mcg, Amlodipine 5mg
tests: TSH levels, X-ray of joints, Blood pressure monitoring, Vitamin B12 levels
